content: hi guysi maked this topic to say something for people ...2 years ago one project ai-tech (ai-tech.io) name start sold tokens for pre public ico ...they did not launch project never , ico website is down and talking about new website , i saw scamers doing that , no body cant login and see tokens i am 2 yeras holder for them and now i just asked why badness about data of launch , they blocked me from twitter and telegram groupi have 1 quastion now ? any one same here ? or they just scamed me ?thanks alot

comments.author: shell32
comments.body: Quote from: blackh4t on May 31, 2023, 08:53:41 AMi have 1 quastion now ? any one same here ? or they just scamed me ?In most cases, the goal is only to collect money from gullible people and deceit. That's all you need to know about ICOs.

There's no guarantee profit there and it's been long gone since the profitable ones has existed.For more awareness, you can post this on Scam Accusations  following the format below;Quote from: escrow.ms on July 21, 2013, 05:28:05 PMScam Report FormatCode:[b][color=black]What happened:: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Scammers Profile Link: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Reference Link: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Amount Scammed: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Payment Method: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Proof of Payment: [/color][/b][b][color=black]PM/Chat Logs: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Additional Notes: [/color][/b]That will gather more attention if you post it there and if someone who also invested on that project and got no more communication on them or has been blocked as well, can also see it from there.
